name: Gear Escape
description:
Play as a little green guy trying to escape a gear factory. You can rotate and attach gears to move boxes and doors. Escape as fast as you can!

This game was made in 2 days during Kenney Jam 2021 with "Rotation" as the theme.

Control (needs keyboard and mouse):

  • A, D, and SPACE to move
  • W and S to rotate gear
  • R to restart level
  • E to open edit mode (unavailable in early level)
  • Left Mouse Button to attach or detach gear (unavailable in early level)

Credit:

  • Sprites and UI by Kenney https://kenney.nl/
  • Music by Defrini https://freemusicarchive.org/music/defrini/the-unfinished/the-chonkermp3-1
